data.name: Survarium - Ultimate Steam Starter Pack
data.detailed_description:
If you are looking for great value combined with effective equipment and bonuses, look no further. The Ultimate Steam Starter Pack provides you with ample opportunity to survive in Survarium.

-Includes-

The Unique SKS "Arrow Head" in Steam Camo

A sniper rifle for all occasions. Light-weight, incredible stopping power and decent size magazine, this weapon will provide you with years of reliable and deadly service.

Bonuses of this item include:
  • All weapon module slots unlocked
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • +25% Silver gain

The Unique AKM "Avenger" in Steam Camo

A military masterpiece from the former Soviet Union; this weapon will never let you down. It’s sturdy, strong, doesn’t overheat and can fire multiple types of ammunition.

Bonuses of this unique item include:
  • All weapon module slots unlocked
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • +25% Silver gain

A Steam-exclusive Uzi "Shadow"

This weapon has long been a favorite choice of not only Survivors but especially the Black Market. Selected for its reliability and compact size, this weapon is a great asset to anyone in need of protection.

Bonuses of this item include:
  • All weapon module slots unlocked
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • ?? Random modifier
  • +25% Silver gain

7 Days of Premium

Advance your character. Gain extra experience, silver, faction reputation, and spare parts!

Bonuses of this item include:
+50% Silver
+50% Reputation
+50% Experience
+50% Spare Parts[/list]

30 000 in-game Silver

Use this currency to purchase equipment, weapons, medkits and more! Spend it wisely!

An Animal Skull Decal

Place this anywhere on your character's jacket or pants.

Skull & Crossed Swords Decal

Place this anywhere on your character's jacket or pants.

data.short_description: If you are looking for great value combined with effective equipment and bonuses, look no further. The Ultimate Steam Starter Pack provides you with ample opportunity to survive in Survarium. Examine the contents closely and choose wisely.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Polish, Russian, Ukrainian, Spanish - Spain

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:
  • Processor:
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Additional Notes:
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
